  • | RankNTypes

  • | OverloadedLabels

  • | UnboxedSums
  • | TypeInType
  • | Strict
  • | StrictData
  • | DerivingVia
  • | QuantifiedConstraints
  • | BlockArguments
name: KnownExtension CPP DeriveDataTypeable DeriveGeneric Generics DeriveFoldable DeriveTraversable DeriveFunctor FlexibleInstances PatternGuards OverlappingInstances UndecidableInstances IncoherentInstances InstanceSigs DoRec RecursiveDo ParallelListComp MultiParamTypeClasses MonomorphismRestriction FunctionalDependencies Rank2Types RankNTypes PolymorphicComponents ExistentialQuantification ScopedTypeVariables PatternSignatures ImplicitParams FlexibleContexts EmptyDataDecls KindSignatures BangPatterns TypeSynonymInstances TemplateHaskell ForeignFunctionInterface Arrows ImplicitPrelude NamedFieldPuns GeneralizedNewtypeDeriving DeriveAnyClass ExtensibleRecords RestrictedTypeSynonyms HereDocuments MagicHash BinaryLiterals TypeFamilies StandaloneDeriving UnicodeSyntax UnliftedFFITypes LiberalTypeSynonyms TypeOperators ParallelArrays RecordWildCards RecordPuns DisambiguateRecordFields OverloadedStrings GADTs MonoPatBinds RelaxedPolyRec ExtendedDefaultRules UnboxedTuples ConstrainedClassMethods PackageImports LambdaCase EmptyCase ImpredicativeTypes NewQualifiedOperators PostfixOperators QuasiQuotes TransformListComp ViewPatterns XmlSyntax RegularPatterns TupleSections GHCForeignImportPrim NPlusKPatterns DoAndIfThenElse RebindableSyntax ExplicitForAll DatatypeContexts MonoLocalBinds NondecreasingIndentation InterruptibleFFI CApiFFI JavaScriptFFI ExplicitNamespaces DataKinds PolyKinds MultiWayIf SafeImports Safe Trustworthy DefaultSignatures ConstraintKinds RoleAnnotations PatternSynonyms PartialTypeSignatures NamedWildCards TypeApplications TypeFamilyDependencies OverloadedLabels DerivingStrategies UnboxedSums TypeInType Strict StrictData DerivingVia QuantifiedConstraints BlockArguments

display_html:
data SrcLoc = SrcLoc {
  • srcFilename :: String
  • srcLine :: Int
  • srcColumn :: Int
}
name: SrcLoc SrcLoc srcColumn srcLine srcFilename

display_html:
data SrcSpan = SrcSpan {
  • srcSpanFilename :: String
  • srcSpanStartLine :: Int
  • srcSpanStartColumn :: Int
  • srcSpanEndLine :: Int
  • srcSpanEndColumn :: Int
}
name: SrcSpan SrcSpan srcSpanEndColumn srcSpanEndLine srcSpanStartColumn srcSpanStartLine srcSpanFilename

display_html:
data Loc a = Loc {
  • loc :: SrcSpan
  • unLoc :: a
}
name: Loc Loc unLoc loc

display_html:
data SrcSpanInfo = SrcSpanInfo {
  • srcInfoSpan :: SrcSpan
  • srcInfoPoints :: [SrcSpan]
}
name: SrcSpanInfo SrcSpanInfo srcInfoPoints srcInfoSpan

display_html:
class SrcInfo si where
  • toSrcInfo :: SrcLoc -> [SrcSpan] -> SrcLoc -> si
  • fromSrcInfo :: SrcSpanInfo -> si
  • getPointLoc :: si -> SrcLoc
  • fileName :: si -> String
  • startLine :: si -> Int
  • startColumn :: si -> Int
name: SrcInfo startColumn startLine fileName getPointLoc fromSrcInfo toSrcInfo

display_html:
data Module l
  • = Module l (Maybe (ModuleHead l)) [ModulePragma l] [ImportDecl l] [Decl l]
  • | XmlPage l (ModuleName l) [ModulePragma l] (XName l) [XAttr l] (Maybe (Exp l)) [Exp l]
  • | XmlHybrid l (Maybe (ModuleHead l)) [ModulePragma l] [ImportDecl l] [Decl l] (XName l) [XAttr l] (Maybe (Exp l)) [Exp l]
name: Module Module XmlPage XmlHybrid

display_html: data ModuleHead l = ModuleHead l (ModuleName l) (Maybe (WarningText l)) (Maybe (ExportSpecList l))
name: ModuleHead ModuleHead

display_html:
data WarningText l
  • = DeprText l String
  • | WarnText l String
name: WarningText DeprText WarnText

display_html:
data ExportSpec l
  • = EVar l (QName l)
  • | EAbs l (Namespace l) (QName l)
  • | EThingWith l (EWildcard l) (QName l) [CName l]
  • | EModuleContents l (ModuleName l)
name: ExportSpec EVar EAbs EThingWith EModuleContents

display_html:
data EWildcard l
  • = NoWildcard l
  • | EWildcard l Int
name: EWildcard EWildcard NoWildcard

display_html:
data ImportDecl l = ImportDecl {
  • importAnn :: l
  • importModule :: ModuleName l
  • importQualified :: Bool
  • importSrc :: Bool
  • importSafe :: Bool
  • importPkg :: Maybe String
  • importAs :: Maybe (ModuleName l)
  • importSpecs :: Maybe (ImportSpecList l)
}
name: ImportDecl ImportDecl importAnn importModule importQualified importSrc importSafe importPkg importAs importSpecs

display_html:
data ImportSpec l
  • = IVar l (Name l)
  • | IAbs l (Namespace l) (Name l)
  • | IThingAll l (Name l)
  • | IThingWith l (Name l) [CName l]
name: ImportSpec IVar IAbs IThingAll IThingWith

display_html:
data Assoc l
  • = AssocNone l
  • | AssocLeft l
  • | AssocRight l
name: Assoc AssocNone AssocLeft AssocRight

display_html:
data Namespace l
  • = NoNamespace l
  • | TypeNamespace l
  • | PatternNamespace l
name: Namespace NoNamespace TypeNamespace PatternNamespace

display_html:
data Decl l
  • = TypeDecl l (DeclHead l) (Type l)
  • | TypeFamDecl l (DeclHead l) (Maybe (ResultSig l)) (Maybe (InjectivityInfo l))
  • | ClosedTypeFamDecl l (DeclHead l) (Maybe (ResultSig l)) (Maybe (InjectivityInfo l)) [TypeEqn l]
  • | DataDecl l (DataOrNew l) (Maybe (Context l)) (DeclHead l) [QualConDecl l] [Deriving l]
  • | GDataDecl l (DataOrNew l) (Maybe (Context l)) (DeclHead l) (Maybe (Kind l)) [GadtDecl l] [Deriving l]
  • | DataFamDecl l (Maybe (Context l)) (DeclHead l) (Maybe (ResultSig l))
  • | TypeInsDecl l (Type l) (Type l)
  • | DataInsDecl l (DataOrNew l) (Type l) [QualConDecl l] [Deriving l]
  • | GDataInsDecl l (DataOrNew l) (Type l) (Maybe (Kind l)) [GadtDecl l] [Deriving l]
  • | ClassDecl l (Maybe (Context l)) (DeclHead l) [FunDep l] (Maybe [ClassDecl l])
  • | InstDecl l (Maybe (Overlap l)) (InstRule l) (Maybe [InstDecl l])
  • | DerivDecl l (Maybe (DerivStrategy l)) (Maybe (Overlap l)) (InstRule l)
  • | InfixDecl l (Assoc l) (Maybe Int) [Op l]
  • | DefaultDecl l [Type l]
  • | SpliceDecl l (Exp l)
  • | TSpliceDecl l (Exp l)
  • | TypeSig l [Name l] (Type l)
  • | PatSynSig l [Name l] (Maybe [TyVarBind l]) (Maybe (Context l)) (Maybe [TyVarBind l]) (Maybe (Context l)) (Type l)
  • | FunBind l [Match l]
  • | PatBind l (Pat l) (Rhs l) (Maybe (Binds l))
  • | PatSyn l (Pat l) (Pat l) (PatternSynDirection l)
  • | ForImp l (CallConv l) (Maybe (Safety l)) (Maybe String) (Name l) (Type l)
  • | ForExp l (CallConv l) (Maybe String) (Name l) (Type l)
  • | RulePragmaDecl l [Rule l]
  • | DeprPragmaDecl l [([Name l], String)]
  • | WarnPragmaDecl l [([Name l], String)]
  • | InlineSig l Bool (Maybe (Activation l)) (QName l)
  • | InlineConlikeSig l (Maybe (Activation l)) (QName l)
  • | SpecSig l (Maybe (Activation l)) (QName l) [Type l]
  • | SpecInlineSig l Bool (Maybe (Activation l)) (QName l) [Type l]
  • | InstSig l (InstRule l)
  • | AnnPragma l (Annotation l)
  • | MinimalPragma l (Maybe (BooleanFormula l))
  • | RoleAnnotDecl l (QName l) [Role l]
  • | CompletePragma l [Name l] (Maybe (QName l))
name: Decl PatSyn ClassDecl InstDecl FunBind DataDecl TypeSig PatBind TypeDecl TypeFamDecl ClosedTypeFamDecl GDataDecl DataFamDecl TypeInsDecl DataInsDecl GDataInsDecl DerivDecl InfixDecl DefaultDecl SpliceDecl TSpliceDecl PatSynSig ForImp ForExp RulePragmaDecl DeprPragmaDecl WarnPragmaDecl InlineSig InlineConlikeSig SpecSig SpecInlineSig InstSig AnnPragma MinimalPragma RoleAnnotDecl CompletePragma

display_html:
data DeclHead l
  • = DHead l (Name l)
  • | DHInfix l (TyVarBind l) (Name l)
  • | DHParen l (DeclHead l)
  • | DHApp l (DeclHead l) (TyVarBind l)
name: DeclHead DHead DHInfix DHParen DHApp

display_html:
data InstRule l
  • = IRule l (Maybe [TyVarBind l]) (Maybe (Context l)) (InstHead l)
  • | IParen l (InstRule l)
name: InstRule IRule IParen

display_html:
data InstHead l
  • = IHCon l (QName l)
  • | IHInfix l (Type l) (QName l)
  • | IHParen l (InstHead l)
  • | IHApp l (InstHead l) (Type l)
name: InstHead IHCon IHInfix IHParen IHApp

display_html:
data Binds l
  • = BDecls l [Decl l]
  • | IPBinds l [IPBind l]
name: Binds BDecls IPBinds

display_html: data IPBind l = IPBind l (IPName l) (Exp l)
name: IPBind IPBind

display_html:
data ResultSig l
  • = KindSig l (Kind l)
  • | TyVarSig l (TyVarBind l)
name: ResultSig KindSig TyVarSig

display_html:
data ClassDecl l
  • = ClsDecl l (Decl l)
  • | ClsDataFam l (Maybe (Context l)) (DeclHead l) (Maybe (ResultSig l))
  • | ClsTyFam l (DeclHead l) (Maybe (ResultSig l)) (Maybe (InjectivityInfo l))
  • | ClsTyDef l (TypeEqn l)
  • | ClsDefSig l (Name l) (Type l)
name: ClassDecl ClsDecl ClsDataFam ClsTyFam ClsTyDef ClsDefSig

display_html:
data InstDecl l
  • = InsDecl l (Decl l)
  • | InsType l (Type l) (Type l)
  • | InsData l (DataOrNew l) (Type l) [QualConDecl l] [Deriving l]
  • | InsGData l (DataOrNew l) (Type l) (Maybe (Kind l)) [GadtDecl l] [Deriving l]
name: InstDecl InsDecl InsType InsData InsGData

display_html: data Deriving l = Deriving l (Maybe (DerivStrategy l)) [InstRule l]
name: Deriving Deriving

display_html:
data DerivStrategy l
  • = DerivStock l
  • | DerivAnyclass l
  • | DerivNewtype l
  • | DerivVia l (Type l)
name: DerivStrategy DerivStock DerivAnyclass DerivNewtype DerivVia

display_html:
data DataOrNew l
  • = DataType l
  • | NewType l
name: DataOrNew DataType NewType

display_html:
data ConDecl l
  • = ConDecl l (Name l) [Type l]
  • | InfixConDecl l (Type l) (Name l) (Type l)
  • | RecDecl l (Name l) [FieldDecl l]
name: ConDecl ConDecl InfixConDecl RecDecl

display_html: data FieldDecl l = FieldDecl l [Name l] (Type l)
name: FieldDecl FieldDecl

display_html: data QualConDecl l = QualConDecl l (Maybe [TyVarBind l]) (Maybe (Context l)) (ConDecl l)
name: QualConDecl QualConDecl

display_html: data GadtDecl l = GadtDecl l (Name l) (Maybe [TyVarBind l]) (Maybe (Context l)) (Maybe [FieldDecl l]) (Type l)
name: GadtDecl GadtDecl

display_html:
data BangType l
  • = BangedTy l
  • | LazyTy l
  • | NoStrictAnnot l
name: BangType BangedTy LazyTy NoStrictAnnot

display_html:
data Unpackedness l
  • = Unpack l
  • | NoUnpack l
  • | NoUnpackPragma l
name: Unpackedness Unpack NoUnpack NoUnpackPragma

display_html:
data Match l
  • = Match l (Name l) [Pat l] (Rhs l) (Maybe (Binds l))
  • | InfixMatch l (Pat l) (Name l) [Pat l] (Rhs l) (Maybe (Binds l))
name: Match Match InfixMatch

display_html:
data Rhs l
  • = UnGuardedRhs l (Exp l)
  • | GuardedRhss l [GuardedRhs l]
name: Rhs UnGuardedRhs GuardedRhss

display_html: data GuardedRhs l = GuardedRhs l [Stmt l] (Exp l)
name: GuardedRhs GuardedRhs

display_html:
data Context l
  • = CxSingle l (Asst l)
  • | CxTuple l [Asst l]
  • | CxEmpty l
name: Context CxSingle CxTuple CxEmpty

display_html: data FunDep l = FunDep l [Name l] [Name l]
name: FunDep FunDep

display_html:
data Asst l
  • = TypeA l (Type l)
  • | IParam l (IPName l) (Type l)
  • | ParenA l (Asst l)
name: Asst TypeA IParam ParenA

display_html:
data Type l
  • = TyForall l (Maybe [TyVarBind l]) (Maybe (Context l)) (Type l)
  • | TyStar l
  • | TyFun l (Type l) (Type l)
  • | TyTuple l Boxed [Type l]
  • | TyUnboxedSum l [Type l]
  • | TyList l (Type l)
  • | TyParArray l (Type l)
  • | TyApp l (Type l) (Type l)
  • | TyVar l (Name l)
  • | TyCon l (QName l)
  • | TyParen l (Type l)
  • | TyInfix l (Type l) (MaybePromotedName l) (Type l)
  • | TyKind l (Type l) (Kind l)
  • | TyPromoted l (Promoted l)
  • | TyEquals l (Type l) (Type l)
  • | TySplice l (Splice l)
  • | TyBang l (BangType l) (Unpackedness l) (Type l)
  • | TyWildCard l (Maybe (Name l))
  • | TyQuasiQuote l String String
name: Type TyCon TyForall TyStar TyFun TyTuple TyUnboxedSum TyList TyParArray TyApp TyVar TyParen TyInfix TyKind TyPromoted TyEquals TySplice TyBang TyWildCard TyQuasiQuote

display_html:
data TyVarBind l
  • = KindedVar l (Name l) (Kind l)
  • | UnkindedVar l (Name l)
name: TyVarBind KindedVar UnkindedVar

display_html:
data Promoted l
  • = PromotedInteger l Integer String
  • | PromotedString l String String
  • | PromotedCon l Bool (QName l)
  • | PromotedList l Bool [Type l]
  • | PromotedTuple l [Type l]
  • | PromotedUnit l
name: Promoted PromotedInteger PromotedString PromotedCon PromotedList PromotedTuple PromotedUnit

display_html: data TypeEqn l = TypeEqn l (Type l) (Type l)
name: TypeEqn TypeEqn

display_html:
data Exp l
  • = Var l (QName l)
  • | OverloadedLabel l String
  • | IPVar l (IPName l)
  • | Con l (QName l)
  • | Lit l (Literal l)
  • | InfixApp l (Exp l) (QOp l) (Exp l)
  • | App l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | NegApp l (Exp l)
  • | Lambda l [Pat l] (Exp l)
  • | Let l (Binds l) (Exp l)
  • | If l (Exp l) (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | MultiIf l [GuardedRhs l]
  • | Case l (Exp l) [Alt l]
  • | Do l [Stmt l]
  • | MDo l [Stmt l]
  • | Tuple l Boxed [Exp l]
  • | UnboxedSum l Int Int (Exp l)
  • | TupleSection l Boxed [Maybe (Exp l)]
  • | List l [Exp l]
  • | ParArray l [Exp l]
  • | Paren l (Exp l)
  • | LeftSection l (Exp l) (QOp l)
  • | RightSection l (QOp l) (Exp l)
  • | RecConstr l (QName l) [FieldUpdate l]
  • | RecUpdate l (Exp l) [FieldUpdate l]
  • | EnumFrom l (Exp l)
  • | EnumFromTo l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | EnumFromThen l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | EnumFromThenTo l (Exp l) (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | ParArrayFromTo l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | ParArrayFromThenTo l (Exp l) (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | ListComp l (Exp l) [QualStmt l]
  • | ParComp l (Exp l) [[QualStmt l]]
  • | ParArrayComp l (Exp l) [[QualStmt l]]
  • | ExpTypeSig l (Exp l) (Type l)
  • | VarQuote l (QName l)
  • | TypQuote l (QName l)
  • | BracketExp l (Bracket l)
  • | SpliceExp l (Splice l)
  • | QuasiQuote l String String
  • | TypeApp l (Type l)
  • | XTag l (XName l) [XAttr l] (Maybe (Exp l)) [Exp l]
  • | XETag l (XName l) [XAttr l] (Maybe (Exp l))
  • | XPcdata l String
  • | XExpTag l (Exp l)
  • | XChildTag l [Exp l]
  • | CorePragma l String (Exp l)
  • | SCCPragma l String (Exp l)
  • | GenPragma l String (Int, Int) (Int, Int) (Exp l)
  • | Proc l (Pat l) (Exp l)
  • | LeftArrApp l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | RightArrApp l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | LeftArrHighApp l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | RightArrHighApp l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | ArrOp l (Exp l)
  • | LCase l [Alt l]
name: Exp Var If Con App List NegApp OverloadedLabel IPVar Lit InfixApp Lambda Let MultiIf Case Do MDo Tuple UnboxedSum TupleSection ParArray Paren LeftSection RightSection RecConstr RecUpdate EnumFrom EnumFromTo EnumFromThen EnumFromThenTo ParArrayFromTo ParArrayFromThenTo ListComp ParComp ParArrayComp ExpTypeSig VarQuote TypQuote BracketExp SpliceExp QuasiQuote TypeApp XTag XETag XPcdata XExpTag XChildTag CorePragma SCCPragma GenPragma Proc LeftArrApp RightArrApp LeftArrHighApp RightArrHighApp ArrOp LCase

display_html:
data Stmt l
  • = Generator l (Pat l) (Exp l)
  • | Qualifier l (Exp l)
  • | LetStmt l (Binds l)
  • | RecStmt l [Stmt l]
name: Stmt LetStmt Generator Qualifier RecStmt

display_html:
data QualStmt l
  • = QualStmt l (Stmt l)
  • | ThenTrans l (Exp l)
  • | ThenBy l (Exp l) (Exp l)
  • | GroupBy l (Exp l)
  • | GroupUsing l (Exp l)
  • | GroupByUsing l (Exp l) (Exp l)
name: QualStmt QualStmt ThenTrans ThenBy GroupBy GroupUsing GroupByUsing

display_html:
data FieldUpdate l
  • = FieldUpdate l (QName l) (Exp l)
  • | FieldPun l (QName l)
  • | FieldWildcard l
name: FieldUpdate FieldUpdate FieldPun FieldWildcard

display_html: data Alt l = Alt l (Pat l) (Rhs l) (Maybe (Binds l))
name: Alt Alt

display_html: data XAttr l = XAttr l (XName l) (Exp l)
name: XAttr XAttr

display_html:
data Pat l
  • = PVar l (Name l)
  • | PLit l (Sign l) (Literal l)
  • | PNPlusK l (Name l) Integer
  • | PInfixApp l (Pat l) (QName l) (Pat l)
  • | PApp l (QName l) [Pat l]
  • | PTuple l Boxed [Pat l]
  • | PUnboxedSum l Int Int (Pat l)
  • | PList l [Pat l]
  • | PParen l (Pat l)
  • | PRec l (QName l) [PatField l]
  • | PAsPat l (Name l) (Pat l)
  • | PWildCard l
  • | PIrrPat l (Pat l)
  • | PatTypeSig l (Pat l) (Type l)
  • | PViewPat l (Exp l) (Pat l)
  • | PRPat l [RPat l]
  • | PXTag l (XName l) [PXAttr l] (Maybe (Pat l)) [Pat l]
  • | PXETag l (XName l) [PXAttr l] (Maybe (Pat l))
  • | PXPcdata l String
  • | PXPatTag l (Pat l)
  • | PXRPats l [RPat l]
  • | PSplice l (Splice l)
  • | PQuasiQuote l String String
  • | PBangPat l (Pat l)
name: Pat PVar PLit PNPlusK PInfixApp PApp PTuple PUnboxedSum PList PParen PRec PAsPat PWildCard PIrrPat PatTypeSig PViewPat PRPat PXTag PXETag PXPcdata PXPatTag PXRPats PSplice PQuasiQuote PBangPat

display_html:
data PatField l
  • = PFieldPat l (QName l) (Pat l)
  • | PFieldPun l (QName l)
  • | PFieldWildcard l
name: PatField PFieldPat PFieldPun PFieldWildcard

display_html: data PXAttr l = PXAttr l (XName l) (Pat l)
name: PXAttr PXAttr

display_html:
data RPat l
  • = RPOp l (RPat l) (RPatOp l)
  • | RPEither l (RPat l) (RPat l)
  • | RPSeq l [RPat l]
  • | RPGuard l (Pat l) [Stmt l]
  • | RPCAs l (Name l) (RPat l)
  • | RPAs l (Name l) (RPat l)
  • | RPParen l (RPat l)
  • | RPPat l (Pat l)
name: RPat RPOp RPEither RPSeq RPGuard RPCAs RPAs RPParen RPPat

display_html:
data RPatOp l
  • = RPStar l
  • | RPStarG l
  • | RPPlus l
  • | RPPlusG l
  • | RPOpt l
  • | RPOptG l
name: RPatOp RPStar RPStarG RPPlus RPPlusG RPOpt RPOptG

display_html:
data Literal l
  • = Char l Char String
  • | String l String String
  • | Int l Integer String
  • | Frac l Rational String
  • | PrimInt l Integer String
  • | PrimWord l Integer String
  • | PrimFloat l Rational String
  • | PrimDouble l Rational String
  • | PrimChar l Char String
  • | PrimString l String String
name: Literal Int Char String Frac PrimInt PrimWord PrimFloat PrimDouble PrimChar PrimString

display_html:
data Sign l
  • = Signless l
  • | Negative l
name: Sign Signless Negative

display_html: data ModuleName l = ModuleName l String
name: ModuleName ModuleName

display_html:
data QName l
  • = Qual l (ModuleName l) (Name l)
  • | UnQual l (Name l)
  • | Special l (SpecialCon l)
name: QName Qual UnQual Special

display_html:
data Name l
  • = Ident l String
  • | Symbol l String
name: Name Symbol Ident

display_html:
data QOp l
  • = QVarOp l (QName l)
  • | QConOp l (QName l)
name: QOp QVarOp QConOp

display_html:
data Op l
  • = VarOp l (Name l)
  • | ConOp l (Name l)
name: Op VarOp ConOp

display_html:
data SpecialCon l
  • = UnitCon l
  • | ListCon l
  • | FunCon l
  • | TupleCon l Boxed Int
  • | Cons l
  • | UnboxedSingleCon l
  • | ExprHole l
name: SpecialCon UnitCon ListCon FunCon TupleCon Cons UnboxedSingleCon ExprHole

display_html:
data CName l
  • = VarName l (Name l)
  • | ConName l (Name l)
name: CName VarName ConName

display_html:
data IPName l
  • = IPDup l String
  • | IPLin l String
name: IPName IPDup IPLin

display_html:
data XName l
  • = XName l String
  • | XDomName l String String
name: XName XName XDomName

display_html:
data Role l
  • = Nominal l
  • | Representational l
  • | Phantom l
  • | RoleWildcard l
name: Role Nominal Representational Phantom RoleWildcard

display_html:
data MaybePromotedName l
  • = PromotedName l (QName l)
  • | UnpromotedName l (QName l)
name: MaybePromotedName PromotedName UnpromotedName

display_html:
data Bracket l
  • = ExpBracket l (Exp l)
  • | TExpBracket l (Exp l)
  • | PatBracket l (Pat l)
  • | TypeBracket l (Type l)
  • | DeclBracket l [Decl l]
name: Bracket ExpBracket TExpBracket PatBracket TypeBracket DeclBracket

display_html:
data Splice l
  • = IdSplice l String
  • | TIdSplice l String
  • | ParenSplice l (Exp l)
  • | TParenSplice l (Exp l)
name: Splice IdSplice TIdSplice ParenSplice TParenSplice

display_html:
data Safety l
  • = PlayRisky l
  • | PlaySafe l Bool
  • | PlayInterruptible l
name: Safety PlayRisky PlaySafe PlayInterruptible

display_html:
data CallConv l
  • = StdCall l
  • | CCall l
  • | CPlusPlus l
  • | DotNet l
  • | Jvm l
  • | Js l
  • | JavaScript l
  • | CApi l
name: CallConv StdCall CCall CPlusPlus DotNet Jvm Js JavaScript CApi

display_html:
data ModulePragma l
  • = LanguagePragma l [Name l]
  • | OptionsPragma l (Maybe Tool) String
  • | AnnModulePragma l (Annotation l)
name: ModulePragma LanguagePragma OptionsPragma AnnModulePragma

display_html:
data Tool
  • = GHC
  • | HUGS
  • | NHC98
  • | YHC
  • | HADDOCK
  • | UnknownTool String
name: Tool GHC HUGS NHC98 YHC HADDOCK UnknownTool

display_html:
data Overlap l
  • = NoOverlap l
  • | Overlap l
  • | Overlapping l
  • | Overlaps l
  • | Overlappable l
  • | Incoherent l
name: Overlap Overlappable Overlapping Overlaps Incoherent Overlap NoOverlap

display_html: data Rule l = Rule l String (Maybe (Activation l)) (Maybe [RuleVar l]) (Exp l) (Exp l)
name: Rule Rule

display_html:
data RuleVar l
  • = RuleVar l (Name l)
  • | TypedRuleVar l (Name l) (Type l)
name: RuleVar RuleVar TypedRuleVar

display_html:
data Activation l
  • = ActiveFrom l Int
  • | ActiveUntil l Int
name: Activation ActiveFrom ActiveUntil

display_html:
data Annotation l
  • = Ann l (Name l) (Exp l)
  • | TypeAnn l (Name l) (Exp l)
  • | ModuleAnn l (Exp l)
name: Annotation Ann TypeAnn ModuleAnn

display_html:
data BooleanFormula l
  • = VarFormula l (Name l)
  • | AndFormula l [BooleanFormula l]
  • | OrFormula l [BooleanFormula l]
  • | ParenFormula l (BooleanFormula l)
name: BooleanFormula VarFormula AndFormula OrFormula ParenFormula

display_html:
class Functor ast => Annotated ast where
  • ann :: ast l -> l
  • amap :: (l -> l) -> ast l -> ast l
name: Annotated amap ann

display_html: (=~=) :: (Annotated a, Eq (a ())) => a l1 -> a l2 -> Bool

data Style = Style {
  • mode :: Mode
  • lineLength :: Int
  • ribbonsPerLine :: Float
}
name: Style Style mode lineLength ribbonsPerLine

  • whereIndent :: Indent
  • onsideIndent :: Indent
  • spacing :: Bool
  • layout :: PPLayout
  • linePragmas :: Bool
}
name: PPHsMode PPHsMode classIndent doIndent multiIfIndent caseIndent letIndent whereIndent onsideIndent spacing layout linePragmas

class Parseable ast where
  • parse :: String -> ParseResult ast
  • parseWithMode :: ParseMode -> String -> ParseResult ast
  • parseWithComments :: ParseMode -> String -> ParseResult (ast, [Comment])
name: Parseable parse parseWithMode parseWithComments

display_html:
data ParseMode = ParseMode {
  • parseFilename :: String
  • baseLanguage :: Language
  • extensions :: [Extension]
  • ignoreLanguagePragmas :: Bool
  • ignoreLinePragmas :: Bool
  • fixities :: Maybe [Fixity]
  • ignoreFunctionArity :: Bool
}
name: ParseMode ParseMode fixities parseFilename baseLanguage extensions ignoreLanguagePragmas ignoreLinePragmas ignoreFunctionArity

display_html:
data ParseResult a
  • = ParseOk a
  • | ParseFailed SrcLoc String
name: ParseResult ParseOk ParseFailed
